meanings.sent1: The teacher nixes any late submissions.
meanings.sent2: She always nixes my ideas without giving them a chance.
meanings.sent3: The cat nixes the idea of taking a bath by hiding under the bed.
meanings.sent4: His stubbornness nixes any possibility of compromise.
meanings.sent5: The storm nixes our plans for a picnic with its heavy rain.

meanings.sent1: I have nixes in my wallet after buying the concert tickets.
meanings.sent2: There were nixes left in the jar after the party.
meanings.sent3: The magician pulled out a hat full of nixes to everyone's surprise.
meanings.sent4: The abandoned house stood empty, with nixes inside.
meanings.sent5: The treasure chest was opened to reveal nixes but memories.
